Name: The Elf Maiden
About the game: PLEASE READ: The Elf Maiden is very bare bones at the moment. ============================================= Elf Maiden is an isometric hack and slash RPG that implements WASD controls. As The Elf Maiden, you are able to wield any weapon at any time and custom tailor your play with no class restrictions. Dual wield any weapon out of the box as you see fit or hold any weapon in both hands for extra power. The Elf Maiden is a Single Player Action RPG. Explore a dynamically changing dungeon filled with danger, adventure, and loot! Complete and repeat dungeon instances for more loot and exp. Crush mobs, blow bosses up with cool builds and claim your prize! Customize your play with different weapons. Slice, Chop, or Bash your way with various different weapon classes in innate properties. Discover The Depths of Transmutation as the dungeons procedurally change with each run!
Meta Title: The Elf Maiden: May 24, 2022, Derek Duong and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Elf Maiden? Check out the release date (May 24, 2022), developer insights from Derek Duong, and a complete game summary.
